text: wyndham hotels and resorts is the
world's largest hotel company we have
about 9 000 or so
properties across 86 countries we use
aws for our global file storage
we use it for our data ingestion and
processing environments
we use it for our loyalty and state data
and we use it for our guest data
we've been using aws for about three and
a half years
we've used it more and more over the
past year and a half
during co good we were able to move our
workforce
off campus very quickly and provide new
solutions to our guests
such as our mobile app and instant hold
people talk a lot about the ability to
flex up what they don't often talk about
is the ability to flex
down and having someone like aws where
your transaction costs go
down as you run fewer transactions
through helps a lot using the aws
technology
we were also able to deliver throughout
the crisis
having things in the cloud means that
our developers could access it from
anywhere
it also meant that i could access it
from anywhere and our eight global
offices could still get to all their
files
aws provides the tools the people and
the services
to allow us to be resilient regardless
of business conditions
we're able to deliver innovation to our
guests and our franchisees
